1: I embrace the strength and presence of the divine.
2: I celebrate the greatness that unites us all.
3: I praise the greatness of the holy name.
4: I promote fairness and justice in my actions.
5: I honor the divine and worship with reverence.
6: I call upon the LORD, and He answers me.
7: I follow guiding principles and cherish meaningful teachings.
8: God forgives and guides us towards better choices.
9: I uplift my spirit in worship on a sacred hill.
